about_the_game:
After all these years your bad dreams are back but something is terribly wrong... It's a surreal and dark horror but people seem to be scared and disgusted by... you? Only the old, sick and unable to evacuate remained in the city. Everyone else fled. Even though there are strange monsters roaming around the city, people seem to avoid you. "You can keep the whole city to yourself, but you are not welcome among us." - This is the message that was left for you in the letter. The reason is not clear. Maybe you were simply mistaken for someone else?

[Game Features]
  • An unusual, creative world that captures the atmosphere of a bad dream.
  • Creative and amusing puzzles designed to surprise the player with their strange, yet consistent logic.
  • Immersive and highly interactive world.
  • Charming, minimalist sketch-style graphics.
  • Atmospheric ambient.
  • "Outside the box" point & click gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains occasional violence, gore and self-harm.

short_description: You're back, but the entire city is empty. All residents have evacuated, and the reason is you. The walls are covered with a number of hurtful messages, but the most common one is - "You can keep the whole city to yourself, but DON'T FOLLOW US, YOU MONSTER!"
